sentences.en: There is a disproportionately high suicide rate among prisoners facing very long sentences.
sentences.cn: 特长刑期的犯人中自杀率高得不成比例。

sentences.en: During the 1990-91 recession, African-Americans suffered disproportionately.
sentences.cn: 在1990到1991年的经济衰退中，非洲裔美国人遭受了不成比例的损失。

sentences.en: Studies show merit aid also tends to benefit disproportionately students who could afford to enroll without it.
sentences.cn: 研究表明，奖学金也逐渐大量流入那些没有奖学金也能入学的学生的囊中。
